QuestData.Title: Hunting Practice
QuestData.Description: Your Winterspring cub paws playfully at your hands. Without any playmates, the cub has few chances to practice its hunting skills.$B$BPerhaps you should take your cub hunting for the small arctic hares that burrow in the snow of northern Winterspring. Bring your cub close to the mounds of snow covering the hare burrows and wait for the cub's instincts to take over.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring your cub near snow-covered burrows in northern Winterspring 5 times to help it learn how to hunt arctic hares.
